Unity lets you choose from pre-built render pipelines, or write your own. More info See in Glossary (URP) offers both a variety of ready to use post-processing A process that improves product visuals by applying filters and effects before the image appears on screen. You can use post-processing effects to simulate physical camera and film properties, for example Bloom and Depth of Field. More
